title: Prohibits the department of health from reducing reimbursement rates of the early intervention program
summary: Prohibits the department of health from reducing reimbursement rates of the early intervention program below those rates in effect on March 1, 2010.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          705

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. WEPRIN -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Health

       AN ACT to prohibit the New York state department of health from reducing
         the  reimbursement  rates for the early intervention program below the
         rates in effect as of March 1, 2010

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The department of health shall not reduce the reimbursement
    2  rates  for the Early Intervention Program established by section 2540 of
    3  the public health law below those reimbursement rates in  effect  as  of
    4  March 1, 2010.
    5    S  2.  This  act  shall take effect immediately and shall be deemed to
    6  have been in full force and effect on and after March 1, 2010.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01111-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to prohibit the New York state department of health from reducing the reimbursement rates for the early intervention program below the rates in effect as of March 1, 2010
